power.name: Attack!
power.text: Each Dog in play may deal 2 melee damage to 1 target

ul.li: One player may take a card from their trash into their hand
Reduce damage dealt by environment targets by 2 until the start of your next turn

text.p: Each Dog in play regains 2 HP.
You may either draw a card, or have a single Dog in play deal 2 melee damage to a target

ul.li: One player may take a card from their trash into their hand
Reduce damage dealt by environment targets by 2 until the start of your next turn

card.name: Heel!
card.text: Select either your deck or your trash. Reveal cards from the top of the pile you selected until you reveal a Dog. Put the Dog into play, and return the other revealed cards to the selected pile. If you selected your deck, shuffle it. Draw a card

card.name: Find!
card.text: Reveal the top X cards of a deck, where X = the number of Dog cards in play + 2. For each target revealed in this way, either discard it or put it into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the deck

card.name: Guard!
card.text: Select X targets, where X = the number of Dog cards in play. Reduce damage dealt to those targets by 2 until the start of your next turn. Draw a card

card.name: Hold!
card.text: Destroy 1 target with up to X HP, where X = the number of Dog cards in play * 2. Draw a card.

card.name: Kill!
card.text: Deal 1 target X melee damage, where X = the number of Dog cards in play * 2

card.name: Fetch!
card.text: Reveal the top X cards of a deck, where X = the number of Dog cards in play + 2. For each equipment or device card revealed in this way, either discard it or put it into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the deck

card.name: Veterinary Care
card.text: Restore all Dog cards to maximum HP. You may draw 1 card. You may play 1 card

card.name: Whistle
card.text: At the end of your turn you may play an Order card

card.name: The Hunt
card.text: At the start of your turn, each Dog in play may deal 1 melee damage to 1 target

card.name: Have a Ride
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by environment cards by 1
